001import pkg_class.GameEngine;
002import pkg_class.UserInterface;
003import pkg_class.GameModel;
004/**
005 * This class is part of the RPandaScape application. 
006 * RPandaScape is a very simple, text based adventure game.  
007 * 
008 * This main class creates the Graphical User Interface,
009 * the game engine and the game model.
010 *
011 * @author Elie DUBOUX
012 * @version 2021.1
013 * @see GameEngine
014 * @see UserInterface
015 * @see GameModel
016 */
017public class Game
018{
019    /**
020     * The graphical user interface.
021     */
022    private UserInterface aGui;
023    /**
024     * The game engine.
025     */
026    private GameEngine aEngine;
027    /**
028     * The Game Model.
029     */
030    private GameModel aGameModel;
031    
032    /**
033     * Create the game and initialise its internal map. Create the inerface and link to it.
034     */
035    public Game()
036    {
037        this.aGameModel = new GameModel();
038        this.aEngine    = new GameEngine(this.aGameModel);
039        this.aGui       = new UserInterface(this.aEngine, this.aGameModel);
040        this.aEngine.setGUI(this.aGui);
041    }//Game()
042    
043    /**
044     * 
045     * @param args The args, not used here.
046     */
047    public static void main(String[] args)
048    {
049        Game vGame = new Game();
050    }
051}//Game
